hero.title: Marketplace of <highlight>smart bots</highlight><break/>for crypto trading
hero.subtitle: Trade with minimal effort thanks to ready-made strategies and an intuitive interface.

primary.title: Adaptive strategies
primary.text: No need to reconfigure bots every time the market moves. Launch them once and they will keep working for you.

security.title: Asset safety and protection
security.text: Withdrawal-free API keys, data encryption, and high security standards keep our users’ assets safe.

ease.title: Easy to use
ease.text: GettBot is designed for both newcomers and experienced traders.

primary.title: High rewards
primary.text: Earn 30% from every subscription purchased by your referrals.

simplicity.title: Simple management
simplicity.text: A convenient dashboard lets you manage referrals and track earnings.

transparency.title: Full transparency
transparency.text: Real-time statistics show referral statuses and every purchase they make.

primary.title: Referral analytics
primary.text:
◦ Number of invited users with an active subscription
◦ Your total earnings
◦ Balance available for withdrawal
◦ Payout history

list.title: Referral list
list.text: View every user who registered via your link together with their purchase history.

link.title: Referral link
link.text: Copy and share your personal link in a single click.

smartBots.title: Launch <highlight>smart bots</highlight><break/>and let them work for you

automaticTrading.title: Automated trading
automaticTrading.content: Smart bots trade 24/7. Deposit funds and watch the profit grow.

advancedStrategies.title: Advanced strategies
advancedStrategies.content: All trading strategies are optimized for different market cycles. They are based on deep analysis of historical data and designed to maximize your profit.

transparency.title: Transparent reporting
transparency.content: Track all trading operations in real time through your personal account. Full transparency and detailed reports help you monitor the effectiveness of your investments.

security.title: Enhanced security
security.content: The platform executes trades on the spot market without using borrowed funds to reduce risk. Only you have access to withdraw funds, which ensures the safety of your assets.

exchanges.title: All exchanges in one place
exchanges.content: Connect all your exchange accounts and monitor them through a single personal account.

stats.title: Trading history archive
stats.content: Archive unused sets and we will save all trading statistics until needed.

calculator.title: Earn from your referrals’ subscriptions!
calculator.subtitle: Receive 30% of every subscription purchased by your referral. Rewards are accrued every month.

step2.title: Pick the set that suits you

promo.heading: GettBot referral program
promo.description: Invite friends and earn generous rewards on every subscription your referrals purchase. The process is so simple that anyone can start.

faqBlock.heading: How does the referral program work?
faqBlock.description: In your account, open the “Referral program” section to find your personal link. Share it via messengers, social media, or email and every user who registers through it becomes your referral.

step1.title: Sign up and get your personal referral link

step3.title: Once they buy a subscription, your reward arrives

step1.title: Reach the minimum balance of 25 USDT.

step4.title: Confirm the request and receive funds within 5 business days.

main.heading: Automate trading so you can focus on what matters

contact.address: Algorithmic Solutions Ltd, F2-2A, Oceanic House, Providence Estate, Mahe, Seychelles

reliability.title: Customer data security
reliability.text: Protecting your data is our top priority.

evolution.title: Continuous product growth
evolution.text: The GettBot team keeps improving the platform for your comfort.

openness.title: Openness to users
openness.text: We collect feedback and are ready to help with any question.

team.heading: Our team
team.description: For years we built smart bots for our own needs. By 2024 we perfected them and are ready to share them with the world.

roadmap.heading: Product roadmap
roadmap.description: We are committed to constant growth and keep enhancing our smart bots so they bring you maximum profit.
roadmap.2022:
Developing proprietary software
for strategy automation
roadmap.2027:
Release of the project’s
own token

faq.defaultSubtitle: If you didn't find the answer you need, contact our support team.

how-start.question: How to start using GettBot?
how-start.answer: Register on the platform, connect your exchange API, choose a suitable smart bot set and start automated trading. The entire process will take no more than 10 minutes.

trading-expertise.question: Do I need to be a trading expert to use GettBot?
trading-expertise.answer: No, you don't! Our smart bots are fully ready to work and don't require special knowledge. Just connect your exchange API and choose a suitable set - the bots will start trading automatically.

funds-security.question: How safe are my funds when using GettBot?
funds-security.answer: Your funds remain on your exchange. GettBot uses only API keys for trading without withdrawal rights. We don't have access to your money and cannot withdraw it.

first-results.question: How long does it take to see the first results?
first-results.answer: First results can be seen within the first hours of bot operation. However, for stable profits, it's recommended to use bots for several weeks.

promo.heading: Answers to popular questions
promo.supportText: If you didn’t find the answer you need, contact our support team.

what-is-gettbot.question: What is GettBot?
what-is-gettbot.answer: GettBot is a marketplace of smart bots for automated cryptocurrency trading. Our bots are ready to run, need no configuration, and start generating profit immediately.

how-works-gettbot.question: How does GettBot work?
how-works-gettbot.answer: Connect your exchange API keys to the platform, choose a suitable set of smart bots, and automated 24/7 trading begins.

who-suitable.question: Who should use GettBot?
who-suitable.answer: The platform suits both beginners and experienced traders thanks to its simplicity and adaptive trading tools.

trading-experience.question: Do I need trading experience to use GettBot?
trading-experience.answer: No. Smart bots are built for users of any level. You can start even if you have never traded before.

free-tariff.question: Is there a free plan?
free-tariff.answer: Yes. New users receive two bots for six months with up to $1,000 trading balance. It’s a great way to test the platform. Activate the free plan right after sign-up.

how-register.question: How do I register and start trading?
how-register.answer: Fill out the quick registration form, connect your exchange account via API, choose a set on the marketplace, and the bots will start trading immediately.

no-exchange-account.question: What if I don’t have an exchange account?
no-exchange-account.answer: Create an account on a supported exchange such as Binance or OKX, generate API keys in your profile, and follow the step-by-step instructions inside GettBot. Need help? Email us at admin@gettbot.io.

connect-exchange.question: How do I connect an exchange?
connect-exchange.answer: Follow the in-app instructions to connect your exchange API. It’s safe and does not allow withdrawals.

available-strategies.question: What strategies are available?
available-strategies.answer: The marketplace offers sets for any user goal and market situation.

learning-materials.question: Do you provide educational materials?
learning-materials.answer: Yes. You’ll get access to tutorials, videos, and tips inside your personal account.

supported-exchanges.question: Which exchanges does GettBot support?
supported-exchanges.answer: We currently support Binance and OKX, with Bybit, Gate.io, HTX, and Bitget coming soon.

bot-stopped-working.question: What if a bot stops working?
bot-stopped-working.answer: Check your API connection. If the issue persists, contact technical support at admin@gettbot.io.

funds-security.question: How are my funds protected?
funds-security.answer: GettBot connects to your exchange with trade-only API keys. Funds stay on your account and remain protected by the exchange’s security systems.

withdrawal-access.question: Do bots have withdrawal access?
withdrawal-access.answer: No. The API keys connected to GettBot don’t allow withdrawals.

registration-data.question: What data is required for registration?
registration-data.answer: Only your email address. All personal data is encrypted and never shared with third parties.

security-measures.question: What security measures do you use?
security-measures.answer: We rely on encryption, access protection, and ongoing improvements to our security infrastructure.

tariff-plans.question: What pricing plans are available?
tariff-plans.answer: GettBot offers plans tailored to different bot quantities and user experience. Custom plans are also available—contact us at admin@gettbot.io for details.

profit-accrual.question: When is profit credited?
profit-accrual.answer: Profit is credited automatically after each successful deal. Real-time statistics are available in your account.

referral-withdrawal.question: How do I withdraw referral rewards?
referral-withdrawal.answer: Open the “Referral program” section, click “Request withdrawal”, and specify the amount. Withdrawals are available once the balance exceeds 25 USDT.

withdrawal-methods.question: Which withdrawal methods are supported?
withdrawal-methods.answer: At the moment, we support withdrawals via Tron Wallet.

what-is-referral.question: What is the referral system?
what-is-referral.answer: The referral system rewards you for bringing new users via your unique link.

get-referral-link.question: Where do I get my referral link?
get-referral-link.answer: Go to the “Referral program” section in your dashboard to copy your personal link.

referral-rewards.question: How are referral rewards accrued?
referral-rewards.answer: You receive 30% of every subscription purchased by your referrals. For yearly or semi-annual plans, payments are made monthly.

referral-withdrawal-timing.question: When can I withdraw referral rewards?
referral-withdrawal-timing.answer: Withdrawals are available once your reward balance reaches 25 USDT. The “Request withdrawal” button will become active.

referral-1.question: Why should I join the referral program?
referral-1.answer: It’s a safe and convenient way to increase your income without extra effort.

referral-2.question: How do I get my referral link?
referral-2.answer: After registration, open the “Referral system” section to copy your unique link and share it with friends.

referral-3.question: How much do I earn per referral?
referral-3.answer: You receive 30% of every subscription your referral purchases. Rewards are paid monthly for annual and semi-annual plans.

referral-4.question: When can I withdraw rewards?
referral-4.answer: You can request a withdrawal once your balance reaches 25 USDT. The “Request withdrawal” button will become active.

referral-5.question: What if I don’t attract new referrals in the second year?
referral-5.answer: If you don’t meet the requirement of new referrals (10% of current active ones), you keep earning from the previously active users only.

links.terms: TERMS OF USE OF THE SERVICE

termsModal.title: TERMS OF USE OF THE SERVICE
termsModal.sectionHeading: GENERAL TERMS AND ACCEPTANCE OF THIS AGREEMENT
termsModal.paragraph1: THIS AGREEMENT GOVERNS YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH ALGORITHMIC SOLUTIONS LTD, A COMPANY REGISTERED UNDER THE LAWS OF SEYCHELLES WITH ITS REGISTERED OFFICE AT F2-2A, OCEANIC HOUSE, PROVIDENCE ESTATE, MAHÉ, SEYCHELLES (THE “COMPANY”) AND YOUR USE OF THE COMPANY’S SERVICES (AS DEFINED BELOW) AVAILABLE AT HTTPS://GETTBOT.IO (THE “SERVICE”). YOU MAY USE THIS SERVICE ONLY IF YOU ACCEPT ALL TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET OUT HEREIN. PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THE SERVICE. BY USING IT, YOU ACCEPT THESE TERMS. IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THESE TERMS (“TERMS OF USE”), DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE.
termsModal.paragraph2: The Company provides the User with access to the Service, including all information, graphics, documents, texts, products, and every other element of the Service, as well as all products and services offered on or through it (“Services”). You may use them under the terms set out in this document and any additional terms available on the Service, including any part-specific conditions that supplement this User Agreement. By ticking “I agree to the Terms of Use” you accept this Agreement and all terms referenced in it. If you do not agree, you must not use the Service. If you disagree with additional conditions for specific Services, you must not use those Services or related content.
termsModal.paragraph3: Communication between the Company and the User regarding the Service is handled via email to admin@gettbot.io or through other channels specified by the Company.

privacyModal.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacyModal.intro: Please carefully read this Privacy Policy («Policy«), which governs how ALGORITHMIC SOLUTIONS LTD., a company incorporated under the laws of Seychelles, with its registered office at F2-2A, Oceanic House, Providence Estate, Mahé, Seychelles («Company«, «we«), collects, uses and discloses information, when you access or use Company`s Service as such term is described in Terms of Use, or when you otherwise interact with us.

section1.title: 1. APPLICABILITY AND ACCEPTANCE OF POLICY
section1.content: 1.1. This Policy defines the Personal Data, explains how Personal Data is collected, used, processed, and disclosed. 1.2. This Policy shall come into effect at the moment you first access the Service. By accessing the Service, clicking a checkmark at the "I agree with the Privacy Policy" button, you unconditionally accept and adhere to provisions of this Policy without any exemptions, limitations and/or exclusions. 1.3. In the event you disagree with any provision of this Policy or would not like to provide your consent for processing of your Personal Data, you shall cease using the Service.

section2.title: 2. INFORMATION ABOUT THE DATA COMPANY
section2.content: 2.1. The data controller of this Service is ALGORITHMIC SOLUTIONS LTD., a company incorporated under the laws of Seychelles, with its registered office at F2-2A, Oceanic House, Providence Estate, Mahé, Seychelles. Contact details: admin@gettbot.io.

section3.title: 3. LEGAL GROUNDS FOR PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING

section4.title: 4. CONSENT TO PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING
section4.content: 4.1. For all Users, including users who are EU persons, to process your Personal Data we need to receive your consent, as it is prescribed by GDPR or other applicable law, we will process your Personal Data in the case we have received from you a freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of your wishes by which you signify agreement to the processing of your Personal Data («Consent«). 4.2. By using the Service, clicking a checkmark at the "I agree with the Privacy Policy" button, you directly and voluntarily accept the provisions of this Policy without any exceptions, restrictions and/or exclusions, and agree with the terms of processing of personal information specified therein. 4.3. Your Consent covers all processing activities with your Personal Data carried out for the same purpose or purposes. When the Processing has multiple purposes, your Consent should be deemed given for all of them, unless otherwise provided by this Policy. 4.4. You have the right to withdraw your Consent at any time. You can submit such a request by admin@gettbot.io. 4.5. Your withdrawal of Consent shall not affect the lawfulness of your Personal Data processing based on Consent before its withdrawal. 4.6. Except as required or enabled by law we will not use or disclose your Personal Data for any purpose for which you refuse Consent or later withdraw your Consent. If you withdraw Consent, you agree that in spite of this withdrawal, we may continue to use those Personal Data previously provided to us to the extent that we are contractually or otherwise legally obliged to do so and to the extent necessary to enforce any contractual obligation you may have towards the Company or in any other way permitted by law.

section5.title: 5. COLLECTION OF PERSONAL DATA
section5.content: 5.1. General Provisions 5.1.1. The type of Personal Data we collect depends on how you are interacting with us. In many cases, you can choose whether or not to provide us with Personal Data, but if you choose not to, you may not get full functionality of the Service. When you visit the Service, you may provide us with the following types of Personal Data: (i)Personal Data that you voluntarily disclose that is collected on an individual basis; and (ii) Personal Data collected automatically when you use the Service. 5.2. Personal Data You provide to Us 5.2.1. In order to fulfill our obligations on provision of an access to Service for you and applicable terms of use, we are entitled to ask you to provide us with your Personal Data, including (but not limited): ● Email address; ● Cryptocurrency exchange User ID that we receive upon connecting your cryptocurrency exchange account with our Service. Personal Data hereof is collected only when voluntarily offered, and solely for purposes that are clearly identified on the Service or in this Policy. 5.2.2. The Company may collect the Personal Data from you in a variety of ways and circumstances, including, but not limited to, registration at the Service, subscription to a newsletter, filling out a form. The Company shall be entitled to combine Personal Data collected in the course of your interaction with different sections of the Service with any other relevant available information. 5.2.3. The Company may collect Personal Data from third parties, including, but not limited to, data obtained from exchanges connected to the Service. 5.3. Personal Data We Collect Automatically 5.3.1. Personal Data collected by or transmitted to the Company in the course of accessing, interacting and operating of the Service may include, without limitation, the following Personal Data: ● device information, which may include (but is not limited to) information about the computer or mobile device you use to access the Service, including the hardware model, operating system and version, the web browser you use, and other device identifiers; ● server log information, which may include (but is not limited to) your login details, the date and time of visits, the pages viewed, your IP address, time spent at the Service and the websites you visit just before and just after the Service; ● information collected by cookies and other tracking technologies. We and our service providers use various technologies to collect information when you interact with the Service, including cookies and web beacons. 'Cookies' are small data files that are stored on your device when you visit a Service which enable us to collect information about your device identifiers, IP address, web browsers used to access to the Service, pages or features viewed, time spent on pages, mobile app performance and links clicked. Web beacons are graphic images that are placed on a website or in an email that is used to monitor the behavior of the user visiting the website or sending the email. They are often used in combination with cookies.

section6.title: 6. USE OF PERSONAL DATA

section7.title: 7. DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL DATA

section8.title: 8. TRANSMISSION OF PERSONAL DATA
section8.content:
8.1. The transmission of Personal Data or any other information (including communications by email) over the Internet or other publicly accessible networks is not one hundred percent secure. The Company is not liable for the security of any Personal Data or any other information you are transmitting over the Internet, or third-party content.

8.2. Information about you may be transferred to, and processed in countries other than the country in which you are a resident. We have taken appropriate safeguards to require that your information will remain protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

8.3. Personal Data of EU Persons transmitted to a recipient outside the European Economic Area may be processed by a staff member operating outside the European Economic Area (EEA) who works for us or for one of digital Content developers or copyright owners. Such staff may be engaged in amongst other things, the fulfilment of your order, the processing of your payment details and the provision of support Services. By submitting your personal data, you agree to this transfer, storing or processing. We will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

section9.title: 9. PROTECTION OF PERSONAL DATA. SECURITY MEASURES
section9.content:
9.1. We take appropriate security, administrative and technical measures to protect any Personal Data you provide regarding the collection, storage and processing of Personal Data, as well as security measures to protect your Personal Data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

9.2. Personal Data is safeguarded from unauthorised access and unlawful processing or disclosure, as well as accidental loss, modification or destruction, through state-of-the-art technical and organisational measures. These are adjusted and updated continuously in tandem with technical developments and organizational changes. Additionally, Personal Data protection audits and other controls are carried out on a regular basis. However, no computer security system is entirely foolproof, and the Internet is not a secure method of transmitting information. As a result, we do not assume any responsibility for the Personal Data you submit to or receive from us through the Internet, or for any unauthorized access or use of that information, and we cannot and do not guarantee that information communicated by you to us or sent to you by us will be received, or that it will not be altered before or after its transmission to us. You agree to not hold the Company liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred as a result of any misappropriation, interception, modification, deletion, destruction or use of information provided through the Service.

section10.title: 10. RETENTION OF INFORMATION
section10.content:
10.1. In accordance with applicable laws and as needed to fulfill our obligations, we may hold your Personal Data. This requirement is conditioned by a need to comply with legal obligations and resolve possible disputes.

10.2. Your Personal Data is stored on a server that we rent in a special third-party cloud infrastructure, unless otherwise provided by this Policy. We do not transfer your Personal Data to such third-party cloud infrastructure.

10.3. The Company may retain your Personal Data until your consent is withdrawn or the Terms of Use are terminated. After the Terms of Use are terminated, the data may be stored for a period of time to comply with legal and regulatory requirements, resolve disputes and prevent money laundering, fraud and other illegal activities.

section11.title: 11. YOUR RIGHTS IN RELATION TO PERSONAL DATA
section11.content: 11.1. The Company is committed to making sure you can exercise your respective rights effectively and free of charge. The Company will ensure each your request related to your Personal Data be reviewed in a timely fashion. 11.2. You have the following rights relating to your Personal Data in accordance with any applicable laws, including GDPR: 11.2.1. Right to access. You can request access to your Personal Data and obtain a copy of such Personal Data in a format acceptable to you (e.g. PDF, DOC, DOCX, etc.). You can submit such a request by contacting admin@gettbot.io. After your request is received, our privacy team reviews the form and conducts the requestor's identity verification, without undue delay. Upon successful verification, you are provided with a copy of your Personal Data. 11.2.2. Right to data portability. You have the right to receive your Personal Data, which you have provided to us, in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and have the right to transmit those data to another Service provider (controller) without hindrance from us. 11.2.3. Right to erasure («Right to be forgotten») and right to rectification. You are entitled to request erasure or rectification of your Personal Data by contacting admin@gettbot.io. We will handle requests for Personal Data to be rectified or deleted, unless there is a legal requirement that prohibits such requests to be fulfilled. When a request is fulfilled, you will be informed that your Personal Data is changed or erased and is not-longer collected, however, to fulfil our legal requirements the Company will store information about each requestor for the purposes of providing evidence that a request has been fulfilled. 11.2.4. Right to object. At all times, you are entitled to object to Processing of your Personal Data. Right to object can be exercised by contacting admin@gettbot.io. Upon receipt of the request, the Company ceases the Processing, unless there is a legal or statutory ground for such Processing. 11.2.5. Right to be informed. If you are inquiring about Processing activities conducted with respect to your Personal Data, the Company, without undue delay, will provide information about: (i)purposes of Processing; (ii) categories and types of Personal Data; (iii) the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed to, in particular recipients in third party countries or international organizations (iii) retention period; (v) source of the relevant Personal Data; (vi) privacy rights and information on data portability; (vii)where the personal data are not collected from the data subject, any available information as to their source; (viii)the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, referred to in Article 22(1) and (4) of the GDPR and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject; (ix) information as to whether personal data are transferred to a third country or to an international organization. Where this is the case, the data in subject to, shall have the right to be informed of the appropriate safeguards relating to the transfer. However, all information about the categories of Personal Data and Processing operational conducted by the Company is available in this Policy. 11.2.6. Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. Supervisory authority means an independent public authority, for example, which is established by an EU member state pursuant to Article 51 GDPR or any other applicable law.

section12.title: 12. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY
section12.content:
12.1. The minimum age to use the Service is 18 years of age. The Company will not knowingly collect Personal Data from minors.

12.2. If minors have provided their personal data, when using the Service, without parental consent, including data that is provided purposefully and data that is collected automatically, parents of minors may submit a request to the Company's email to stop processing the personal data of such minors.

section13.title: 13. ALTERATIONS TO POLICY
section13.content:
13.1. We have the right, at our discretion, to update this Policy at any time. We recommend that you frequently check this Policy to find any changes and stay informed about how we help protect the Personal Data.

13.2. By using the Service, you will acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to periodically review this Policy and be aware of the changes.

13.3. The subsequent use of the Service after changes to this Policy will also be considered as your acceptance of these changes.

13.4. This Policy may from time to time be translated into other languages. To the extent that any discrepancy may exist between the English version of this Policy and its version in another language, the English version prevails.

section14.title: 14. DATA PROTECTION OFFICER
section14.content: 14.1. The Company appoints an expert on data privacy who works independently to ensure that the Company is adhering to the policies and procedures set forth in the GDPR (data protection officer). Data protection officer assists the Company to monitor internal compliance, inform and advise on data protection obligations, provide advice regarding data protection impact assessments (DPIAs) and act as a contact point for data subjects and the supervisory authorities.

section15.title: 15. FEEDBACK
section15.content: 15.1. We welcome your questions and suggestions with respect to the implementation or amendment of this Policy. Please use this feedback for communicating with us by contacting  admin@gettbot.io.

cookiesModal.title: COOKIE NOTICE
cookiesModal.intro:
This Cookie Notice (this "Notice") is part of the Privacy Policy.

The Service (as that term is defined in the Terms of Use) uses cookies (as that term is defined in the Privacy Policy) and web beacons to provide services that best meet your needs and to accumulate statistical information to analyze and improve our services and the Service.

By using the Service, you consent to the use of cookies and other similar technologies in accordance with this Notice. If you do not consent to us ('Company' as that term is defined in the Terms of Use) using cookies, you must:

Disable the use of cookies in your browser settings (for details see Section 2 'Managing Cookies'); and/or
Stop using the Service.

section1.title: 1. TYPES OF COOKIES THAT CAN BE USED IN THE SERVICE
section1.intro: We may use the following types of cookies on the Service for the specified purposes:

tableRows.purpose: Necessary for the normal operation of the Service, navigation through the resource and use of its functionality. Disabling this type of cookies may make some features of the Service unavailable to you.
Designed to remember your individual preferences and personalise the content of the Service.
May be used for the purpose of delivering targeted advertising and evaluating its effectiveness. We may share these files with relevant advertising systems and sites where our adverts are placed.
Necessary to analyse the use of the Service by visitors and to improve the Service.

section1.content: THE CURRENT LIST OF COOKIES COLLECTED CAN BE FOUND IN ANNEX A. In order to collect analytical data and/or promote our services, identify potential customers, we may use third party services to analyse cookies. This data may not be considered personal data under applicable law as it does not identify you without other information. The E-mail address received may be used solely as a means of contacting you in order to determine your interest in our services.

section2.title: 2. MANAGEMENT OF COOKIES
section2.content:
You can disable the use of cookies on our Service at any time using the appropriate settings of the browser you are using and thus permanently disable the use of cookies. For example, most browsers allow you to refuse to accept cookies and to delete cookies. The way in which you can disable cookies depends on the browser you are using. However, you can get the latest information about blocking and deleting cookies from these links:

Google Chrome
Mozilla Firefox
Opera
Microsoft Internet Explorer
Safari Desktop, Safari Mobile
Microsoft Edge

We consider your 'Do Not Track' request and do not track your activities, use cookies or contextual advertising when your browser is set to 'Do Not Track'. You can limit the collection of information by disabling cookies in your browser. You can also change your browser settings to require your permission each time the service attempts to set a cookie. However, our Service (and many other websites) rely on cookies to enable certain features of the Service. If you choose to disable cookies, some features available on the Service may not work properly.

section3.title: 3. WEBSITES AND LINKS NOT RELATED TO THE COMPANY
section3.content: The Service may contain links to services not related to the Company. We are not responsible for the actions of third-party sites. When you access other services through a link on our Service, the owners of those services may use cookies in accordance with their cookie policies, which may differ from those presented herein. You should read their privacy and cookies policies carefully before providing them with any personal information.

section4.title: 4. WARNING ABOUT AUTOMATIC COOKIE FUNCTIONALITY
section4.content: Browsers allow you to save passwords and other login identifiers, so you may not be able to re-authorise when you go to the Service. The Company strongly recommends that you do not use this feature to prevent unauthorised use of your data.

section5.title: 5. FINAL PROVISIONS
section5.content:
You can receive any clarification on any questions regarding cookies on the Service by contacting us by email: admin@gettbot.io

The most current version of this Privacy Policy is freely available on the Service. In our sole discretion, we may change this Notice from time to time. Your use of the Service after the changes have been made constitutes your acceptance of the revised Notice.
section5.annexSubtitle: List of cookies that the Service can use:

cookies.title: cookieConsent
cookies.appointment: Stores the user's consent to the use of cookies

cookies.title: _ga
cookies.appointment: Analysis of user behavior on the site
